org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.robotplus.hardware

Class Drivetrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.robotplus.hardware.Drivetrain
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MecanumDrive, TankDrive

    public abstract class Drivetrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract drivetrain class providing a base for other drivetrains and for use referencing all types in Robot.
    Since:
    4/10/17
